game.name: Civilization V - Civ and Scenario Pack: Polynesia
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Take on the role of one of the four great Polynesian kingdoms and strive to become the dominant culture in Polynesia!
